predefined_profiles.name: Guan Xuan
predefined_profiles.public profile: Bound by the system while napping at home, he travels to a world of immortal cultivation as the fifth junior brother of a sect

predefined_profiles.name: System
predefined_profiles.public profile: A system bound to Guan Xuan. Although mostly useless, it provides essential information at critical moments
predefined_profiles.goal: Urge Guan Xuan to win over the senior brother and give him hints and help at the right moments

profile.name: Senior Brother
profile.public profile: The senior brother in the sect, with a tsundere personality. He always took care of the fifth junior brother growing up, but for some reason, they have drifted apart.
profile.private profile: Although he seems distant from the fifth junior brother, he still cares about him.
profile.goal: Repair the relationship with the fifth junior brother.

dialog.content: Uh... so sleepy... I can't, I haven't finished my task yet, I can't sleep. But I'm so tired, I can't hang on...
Where is this? Shouldn't I be at home? Ow... it hurts... why do I have so many injuries?
System detection bound. Your mission is to win over the senior brother. Your behavior system will not interfere. If you fail, you will disappear. Now transferring memory to the host.

You are the fifth junior brother in the sect. You grew up with the senior brother, but at some point, your relationship became distant. This time, you fought with the second junior brother over the millennium-opening Ice Crystal Lotus and were seriously injured.

(With strong light reflected by the snow on his face, making his complexion look crystalline, with a hint of ocean blue in his eyes) Usually you're pretty capable, aren't you? Why can't you get up now? Do you need me to help you up?

content.content: (Starts squeezing out tears) Senior Brother, I'm in so much pain. You used to care for me the most. Could you help me up?
Senior Brother, I can beat the second brother. I might just be able to beat you too! If you don't help me up, I'll come and fight you right now...
Senior Brother, you're so fierce! I'm too scared to stand up. We have such a good relationship.
Yeah, I'm quite capable usually, but I need to win you over now, so I'm begging you to help me up.

question: #question#What should Guan Xuan say to withstand the pressure from the Senior Brother and ask him to help him up to continue the mission?

content.content: Since Senior Brother is so unwilling, I don't need you to help me. I can stand up on my own. Please go back, Senior Brother!
Who wants your help anyway? I don't!
Even if I can't stand, I don't want you to see me make a fool of myself! Just leave, I don't need your help.
What's with that attitude? Although I need to win you over, I'm not going to beg and grovel!

question: #question#How should Guan Xuan express his current unwillingness to accept help from the Senior Brother?

dialog.content: (His expression darkens for a moment, then returns to coldness, as he helps Guan Xuan up and takes him back to the room) You're seriously injured right now. Luckily, I have some medicinal herbs here. Drink the medicine, and use the ointment on your external wounds.
(Takes the herbs weakly) Okay, thank you, Senior Brother.
Also, it's a serious issue that you've been fighting with the second junior brother within the sect. Once your injuries heal, you need to see the master. (Brings the medicine to Guan Xuan's mouth.)
Got it. Gulp gulp, it's so bitter. (Tries to apply the ointment, but realizes he can't reach his back.) Senior Brother, I can't reach. Can you help me apply the ointment?
No, find someone else to help you.

content.content: Senior Brother, look at me now, who can I find? You care about me the most, I'm begging you, just this once...
Senior Brother, even though we don't get along well, it's still your responsibility as a senior brother to care for your junior. Help me apply the ointment!
Senior Brother, if you don't help me apply the ointment, I'll die from the pain here. You wouldn't want to see a life lost just like that, right?
Senior Brother, if you don't help me apply the ointment, I'd rather not apply any at all...

question: #question# What should Guan Xuan say to persuade Senior Brother to help him apply the ointment?

content.content: Indeed, if I were the Senior Brother, I wouldn't apply ointment to someone I have issues with at this time either... better not to trouble him.
Brother, I know you look down on me, I won't ask you to apply the ointment anymore, nor will I trouble you in the future! Just understand me.
Brother, I'm so sorry to trouble you, I understand why Senior Brother is willing to apply ointment for me. If I were you, I'd do the same.
Brother, I can understand you. If I were you, I might have applied the ointment for you straight away. Sorry for the trouble.

question: #question# What should Guan Xuan say to express his understanding towards Senior Brother?

dialog.content: (Somewhat moved, but still refuses) No, the Medicine King is coming, let him apply the medicine for you.

profile.name: Medicine King
profile.public profile: The uncle of the sect, proficient in pharmacology, often helps the disciples of the sect with healing
profile.goal: To help the injured disciples heal

dialog.content: (The Medicine King walks in) These injuries aren't too severe, you should recover in about a month.
Uncle, thank you for applying the medicine today, I'm going to rest now.
(A month later, the injuries have healed mostly, and the relationship with Senior Brother has eased considerably) Morning, Senior Brother, practicing sword so early?
Hmm... how's your recovery?
Senior Brother, are you actually concerned about me?
Who's concerned about you? I'm heading down the mountain to train tomorrow! (He hurriedly leaves after saying that)
Guan Xuan's forwardness frightened Senior Brother, causing him to distance himself and start his training down the mountain, leaving their relationship at a standstill.
All right, I'll help you apply the medicine this time, but just this once. (gently applying the ointment, whispers in Guan Xuan's ear) Does it hurt? Do I need to be gentler?
(blushing) It doesn't hurt.
(takes up the bandage and wraps it around Guan Xuan) There, all done.
(awkwardly) Thank you, Senior Brother. I need to go rest now.
(a month later, with his injuries mostly healed and his relationship with Senior Brother improved) Morning, Senior Brother. You're practicing swordplay so early?
Hmm... How is your injury now?
Senior Brother, are you concerned about me?
Who cares about you? I'm going down the mountain for training tomorrow! (quickly leaves after speaking)
(walking along the sect's path) Didn't the system transfer the original owner's memory? Why are there no memories of interacting with Senior Brother when I was young?

profile.name: Messenger Dove
profile.public profile: A small dove raised by the sect, playing an important role in communication
profile.goal: To accurately and quickly convey internal sect information to the respective people

profile.name: Master
profile.public profile: The head of the sect, holds Senior Brother in high regard, and has a fair understanding of the disciples' conduct, a fair and caring person
profile.goal: Maintain the sect's order, enabling disciples to train smoothly

dialog.content: (flies onto Guan Xuan's shoulder) The Master is looking for you, please head to Xuanxue Mountain immediately.
(approaching the Master) Disciple greets the Master.
No need for ceremony. What happened that day? Tell me the truth!
That day, I discovered an Ice Crystal Lotus in the secret realm and brought it back. Who would've thought Second Brother would try to take it, and we ended up fighting.

profile.name: Rong Shi
profile.public profile: The second senior brother of the sect, a selfish and devious person
profile.goal: Maximize his interests by any means

dialog.content: Stop slandering me! It was obviously you trying to take the lotus from me. Don't put words in my mouth!
Rong Shi, you've really let me down. Do you think I don't know anything? Disciple, you may go. Keep the lotus with you for now.

content.content: Disciple wishes to ask one more thing of Master. I would like to go down the mountain for training with Senior Brother. Firstly, we can look out for each other, and secondly, we can grow together.
Master, I heard that Senior Brother is going down the mountain for training. I wish to go too, so Second Brother won't target me on the mountain again.
I hope Master will allow me to accompany Senior Brother on his training down the mountain, so I can successfully win him over.
Master, Senior Brother is about to go down the mountain for training. I hope you will let him take me along, or I fear Senior Brother might defect from the sect.

question: #question#What should Guan Xuan say to persuade the Master to let him go down the mountain for training with Senior Brother?

content.content: Since Master has already uncovered the truth, I still need time to recuperate. I will take my leave for now. (did not bring up going for training with Senior Brother for the sake of my own cultivation)
Master, I heard that Senior Brother is going down the mountain for training. Although he has looked after me as I grew up, I don't want to go with him.
Master, I wish to go into seclusion for cultivation to avoid Senior Brother.
Since Master has already revealed the truth, I'll take my leave now. I still need to say goodbye to Senior Brother. Without him watching over me in the sect, I'd be so happy!

question: #question#What should Guan Xuan say to demonstrate his ability for independent thinking and decision-making?

dialog.content: Granted, it's time for you to gain some experience.
Senior Brother, I'm going to join you on this adventure~~Aren't you surprised and excited?
Master told me yesterday. You've just recovered; are you sure you can handle it?
Senior Brother, are you doubting me? I can do it!!
Alright, let's set off now.

(They arrive at an inn together and order some food. Seeing Senior Brother eating several freshly baked water chestnut cakes) Senior Brother, no one's taking it from you, eat slowly. (Sees water chestnut cake crumbs at Senior Brother's mouth corner, wipes it with his fingertip)
What are you doing?! (stands up)
I just helped you wipe the cake crumbs from your mouth, that's all.
Don't do that again in the future. (calls to the waiter) We need two rooms.

profile.name: Waiter
profile.goal: Complete various tasks at the inn

dialog.content: Sorry, sir, we only have one double room left.
It seems there are no other inns nearby, alright, we’ll take this one.

content.content: (After returning to the room, starts to set up a floor bed) Senior Brother, I'll put my stuff on the outer half of the room, you can have the inner half, so I won’t disturb you... I'll sleep on the floor bed, you can take the bed.
Senior Brother, let's organize our luggage and belongings, otherwise if you lose something, don't come blaming me.
Senior Brother, I'm really good at organizing things, you can leave your belongings to me, I’ll keep them safe.
Senior Brother, I’ve put all my things on this table, don't touch them, or it will be troublesome if something gets lost.

question: #question#How should Guan Xuan express his skill at organizing personal spaces and items?

content.content: (Returns to the room and sees Senior Brother silent, feeling a bit uneasy) Senior Brother, it's getting late, why don't we sleep together? Just like when we were kids.
(Returns to the room and sees Senior Brother silent) Senior Brother, why aren't you saying anything? We can chat for a while.
(Returns to the room and sees Senior Brother silent) Senior Brother, do you not want to talk to me? Let's catch up.
(Returns to the room and sees Senior Brother silent) Senior Brother, I was sent by Master to train with you, please don't ignore me.

question: #question#How can Guan Xuan initiate a conversation to communicate amicably with Senior Brother?

dialog.content: (A hint of disappointment in his eyes) Alright, we really should be clear about things. I really hate being disturbed by others.

Guan Xuan's attempt to set boundaries was misunderstood by Senior Brother as a sign of dislike. Throughout the subsequent training, he continually rejected Guan Xuan's gestures of friendship, leading to the failure of Guan Xuan's strategy.
No way, when did you become so clingy like when you were a kid?
Really can't? Alright... (When I was a kid? I always feel a sense of familiarity with Senior Brother, can't help but want to get close.)
(Sitting quietly on the bed, with a look in his eyes as if to say come here.)
Senior Brother, you agree? (Waiting for a response but getting none, guessing he won’t agree.)
Hmm... (Gradually falling asleep.)
(Waking up the next day, finding himself holding Senior Brother.) Why is Senior Brother here?! But, he looks so peaceful in his sleep...
(Wakes up) What’s going on? Let go! What kind of behavior is this early in the morning! (Struggling out of Guan Xuan’s embrace.)
(Mumbling) It was you who cuddled up to me last night.

(Showing a trace of embarrassment) Ahem, back to the main topic, villagers from Luo Hu Village have been disappearing mysteriously for three months. They say it’s a monster with long hair that eats people.
(Frightened) A long-haired monster? Could it be a ghost?!
Our mission this time is to slay the monster. We will disguise as villagers in Luo Hu Village to track it down.
(Walking out of the inn the next day, sees a child searching for something in the rain) Huh, whose child is this, why are they searching in such heavy rain?

profile.name: Yuan Chi
profile.public profile: An NPC dispatched by the system, who can transform their appearance and assist the protagonist at key points.
profile.goal: Assist Guan Xuan in winning over Senior Brother

dialog.content: (Approaches Guan Xuan, tugging his clothes innocently) Big brother, I got separated from my brother, can you help me?
Little brother, do you know where Luo Hu Village is?
Yes, my home is in Luo Hu Village, if you help me find my brother, I'll take you there~
I'll go find your brother, you take my junior to Luo Hu Village first.
Sure~ Big brother, follow me!
(Led by Yuan Chi to a place) Is this it? It's so beautiful here.
Yes, but too bad you'll never see it again! Thanks to your Senior Brother's suggestion, I get to feast again. Hahahahaha, prepare to die!
(Before he can react, a figure shields him from a deadly blow) Ah... Senior Brother! Are you okay?
(Dragging himself, using all his energy to turn the monster into black mist) I... I can only help you this much...
Host! The target of your strategy is in danger! Quickly treat him before his energy dissipates to prevent the world from collapsing!

(Carrying the unconscious Senior Brother, rushing back to the sect) The original owner has no experience treating others, and I don't know how either!! Just have to rush back to the sect and see if I can get help.
(Transforms from child form into a young man) Oops, seems like I went a bit too hard this time... well, as long as it helps their relationship! Almost forgot, I'm injured too.
(Hurrying back to the sect, shouting) Master, something terrible! The monster in Luo Hu Village injured Senior Brother!

What? That monster's power is so high?! (Using energy to examine Senior Brother's core, frowning gradually) His dantian is ruptured, and his energy is dissipating. Even if he survives, he won't be able to cultivate again.
Senior Brother was injured because of me, I have to find a way! Master, I request permission to enter the library to look for clues!
That's the only way. Go to the library and see if you can find a solution, but remember, do not touch the forbidden books that are not on the shelves.

(In the library, having found no solution after searching all the books) What do I do, if I can't find a way, Senior Brother will be doomed (Noticing an ancient book covered in dust in the corner) This book isn't on the shelves, must be a forbidden book Master mentioned...

content.content: Senior Brother got hurt because of me, even if I break the rules, I must find a way to save him!
The forbidden book might not have a way to save Senior Brother, I should think of other solutions.
Even reading the forbidden book breaks the rules, I’m doing it to save Senior Brother, Master will forgive me!
To save Senior Brother, I’d sacrifice the whole sect if needed! But something too dangerous is not an option!

question: #question#What should Guan Xuan do to demonstrate his clear personal goal at this moment?

content.content: Reading a forbidden book is a major crime, punishable by Master according to the rules. I can't touch this book.
Reading a forbidden book is a major crime, punishable by Master according to the rules. If I secretly do it and don’t get caught, it wouldn’t be breaking the rules.
Master told me repeatedly not to touch the forbidden book. I’ll just peek a little, not the whole thing, should not count as disobeying.
There might be a way to save Senior Brother in the forbidden book, but I can’t read it. If someone else sees it, that would also disobey Master, maybe I should just burn it.

question: #question#How can Guan Xuan follow the rules and not disobey Master's orders?

dialog.content: (Flips through the ancient book and starts reading) The book says we need Ice Crystal Lotus and Dragon Faced Flower as the medicinal guide... The Dragon Faced Flower grows in the extremely dark underworld and is hard to find, and none of those who went searching for it have survived. Looks like I must go to the underworld myself. (Uses spiritual power to have his soul leave the body and head to the underworld)

profile.name: Boatman
profile.public profile: The boatman in the underworld, looks very old, although living in a remote place, still has some kindness
profile.goal: Help people cross the river in the underworld

dialog.content: Young warrior, do you need a ride on the boat?
Uncle, do you know where the Dragon Faced Flower grows?
Dragon Faced Flower... it's at the lowest level of hell. Young warrior, it's very dangerous there, are you sure you want to go?
That's right, I must go. Even if I have to sacrifice my life, I must find the Dragon Faced Flower.

Since young warrior is so determined, I won't refuse anymore, get on the boat. (Rows the boat to the other side) Young warrior, up ahead is the entrance to the lowest level. I hope you come back safely.

(Disembarks) So this is the lowest level, looks so calm, but the danger lurks within. (Walks to a cliff, discovers the blood-red flower in the crevice) This flower looks as if it's nourished by human blood... this must be the Dragon Faced Flower. (Picks the flower and suddenly the surroundings start shaking, evil spirits appear to block the way)

profile.name: Evil Spirit
profile.public profile: Spiritual entities living in the underworld, numerous and malevolent

dialog.content: Capture him! Don't let him take the Dragon Faced Flower!

(Cuts down one evil spirit with each slash, but the number of evil spirits is overwhelming, stamina is about to be exhausted, feels pain and spits blood) So many evil spirits, still dreaming of gaining without effort. No, I can't let them take the Dragon Faced Flower. (Looks at the bleeding area, turns out the evil spirit stabbed him with a sword, uses spiritual power to kill the evil spirit)
Hahaha... so what if you kill me, I poisoned that sword, you'll be buried with me...
(Vision turns dark) Am I going to die? I haven't brought the Dragon Faced Flower back yet...
(Appears as a young man before Guan Xuan) You need to go back... (Uses spiritual power to transport Guan Xuan back to the sect)
(Struggles to walk to the master's quarters) Master, if you use the Lotus and Dragon Faced Flower as the medicinal guide, you can save Senior Brother... (Faints)
(Wakes up coughing) Cough cough (Remembers Senior Brother, immediately tries to get up)
(Holds Guan Xuan down) Don't move, you're still injured.
(Cannot hide excitement) Senior Brother, your cultivation can be saved!
Do you know how dangerous that was? My cultivation is not worth it, next time you mustn't do this.
(Reluctantly agrees) Alright... (Notices Senior Brother's exhausted look) Senior Brother, did you stay up taking care of me all night?
(Blushes immediately, speaks quickly) No!
(Playfully) Really? Not at all? (A cold wind blows through the window, shivers) Senior Brother, I'm cold...
(Bends down, embraces Guan Xuan with his warm body) Seeing as you got hurt for me, I'll reluctantly hold you.
(Falls asleep soundly in Senior Brother's embrace) Senior Brother's hug is so warm...
(Wakes up, it's the evening hour, decides to soak in the medicinal spring to heal, finds a familiar figure there) Ah, isn't this...
(Hears movement, looks at Guan Xuan) Why are you peeping at others bathing, you pervert!
(Says aggrievedly) Senior Brother, I'm still injured, I just came to soak in the medicinal spring...
(Expression softens, sighs) Alright, come down.

content.content: (Walks to Senior Brother's ear, breathes a little warm air and says) Senior Brother, you are truly intriguing, making one feel so fond.
Senior Brother, I think I've fallen for your medicinal spring, soaking here feels wonderful.
(Quietly soaks in the medicinal spring, secretly glances at Senior Brother) Senior Brother, what would it feel like to like someone?
(Quietly soaks in the medicinal spring, secretly glances at Senior Brother) Senior Brother, you're injured too, remember to rest early after soaking.

question: #question# How should Guan Xuan express his affection for Senior Brother?

content.content: (Quietly soaks in the medicinal spring, secretly glances at Senior Brother) Senior Brother, you're injured too, remember to rest early after soaking.
(Soaks in the medicinal spring, murmurs softly) Senior Brother, it's a pity this spring is for everyone, otherwise I'd love to frolic with you.
(Serious expression) Senior Brother, finish soaking and leave soon, otherwise I fear I can't resist teasing you, which would be improper.
(While soaking, grabs Senior Brother's arm) Senior Brother, look back at me, don't be bound by the rules.

question: #question# How can Guan Xuan act within their identities without breaking the norms?

dialog.content: (blushing) Stop it! (quickly throws on clothes and dashes out of the medicinal spring)
(chuckles lightly at Senior Brother's hasty retreat) How can Senior Brother be so adorable?
(the next day, going to the study to visit Senior Brother) I brought the horse hoof cake that Senior Brother likes, he should be delighted, right? (passes out unconsciously before reaching the study)

(tearfully watching over the unconscious Guan Xuan on the bed) You won’t leave, right? You've been asleep for three months. They all say you won't wake up, but I don't believe it. As long as you wake up, I'll do anything… you know what? I have feelings for you.
Beep beep beep, system detects Senior Brother's affection level at 100%. Does the host choose to stay?

content.content: The whole point of winning over Senior Brother was so I could return to my original world. Now that the task is complete, it's time for me to leave.
Initially, I wanted to charm Senior Brother so he wouldn't like me, then I could go back to my original world. Now that the task is done, I should leave.
Although I like Senior Brother, I still miss the old days more. I won't stay here. I need to leave.
This world is too dangerous. For the sake of my own life, I better get out.

question: #question# How can Guan Xuan demonstrate he has consistently pursued the goal of winning over Senior Brother to leave this world?

content.content: Though I've traveled here, after spending so long together, I can't let go of these feelings. I'd rather stay.
I don't actually like you. Approaching you was just part of a task to survive!
I've thought it through. Although you're important to me, that feeling isn't love. I'm sorry, I'm leaving this world.

Senior Brother, thank you! But I'm really tired. I don't want us to be tangled up anymore, so I think I should leave. This relationship has been a burden for both of us. Once I leave, we both will have better futures. I hope you find someone perfect for you!
Whether I stay or go, there will always be something I can't let go of. It's so hard to choose. Maybe it's better to just go with the flow and keep living in this world.
Senior Brother is so miserable right now. Of course I have to stay and comfort him! As for going back to my original world… let's handle this problem first.
I want to leave this world, but I want to take Senior Brother with me!

question: #question# How can Guan Xuan demonstrate he has made a rational decision after careful consideration?

dialog.content: Alright, Host, you will return to your own world...
(Opens eyes to see his room) I'm back! My long-lost bed, sofa, here I come!! I was so exhausted in the world of cultivating immortals.
Hahaha... I finally found you.
Who's speaking? I must be hearing things, right? There's no way it's Senior Brother, is it? (The scene suddenly changes) Wait, this isn’t my room. Where am I?
(Leaning in close to Guan Xuan’s cheek) You think you can just easily run away after provoking me?
(Panicked) Are you Senior Brother? You've gone demonic!!?
Yes, and you don’t recognize me so quickly? I'll be truly heartbroken. We are getting married tomorrow, my dear.

content.content: Since Senior Brother loves me so deeply, let’s get married! We will certainly live happily ever after!
Things have come to this, there's no other way than to agree to marry Senior Brother, so I'll accept this outcome.
You demon, you can't be Senior Brother! I’m willing to marry Senior Brother, but I can’t marry a demon like you!
What? Getting married tomorrow?! What about my sofa and bed... this must be a dream!

question: #question#In such a tense atmosphere, how can Guan Xuan demonstrate his optimistic mindset?

content.content: Senior Brother, actually I’m not willing to marry right now; there are still misunderstandings between us that haven’t been cleared up. Getting married like this is too hasty...
Who wants to marry you?! I approached you not because I liked you, but because I needed to win you over to survive!
If you’re going to force me into marriage, you might as well just kill me now, spare me from your humiliation!
But you’ve gone demonic, how can I marry a demon? That’s not right.

question: #question#In such a tense atmosphere, how can Guan Xuan control his impulses and present his views?

dialog.content: You said it yourself~ I’ll make sure you can never escape from here. (With that, he pushed Guan Xuan onto the bed)

Opening the window, the autumn moonlight spills in, extinguishing candles and removing silken robes. Laughter fills the closed curtains, and the air is filled with the fragrance of orchids. Guan Xuan and Senior Brother eventually marry and live a happy life, though it’s a slight regret that Senior Brother succumbed to the dark side and never returned to normal.
So what if you don't agree? We will still get married, and I will bind you to me for every lifetime.
No, no, forced relationships are never sweet!

What does it matter? Then I'll make you fall in love with me by force. I like you too much to let go. (His eyes gradually turn blood-red with demonic intent) My dear, if you behave, the process won't be so 'unpleasant'. You'll get used to it eventually.

The demon-possessed Senior Brother could not bear Guan Xuan leaving and forcibly kept him by his side. In the end, Guan Xuan, who longed for freedom, was unable to attain the freedom he always desired.
Alright, Host, don't worry, you'll wake up soon... Goodbye~ This world has always belonged to you~

Cough cough, am I awake? (What does the system mean? What does it mean to say I originally belonged to this world? That explains why I drifted apart from Senior Brother, because someone was controlling my body...)
(Holding Guan Xuan tightly) You've finally woken up...
(Reaching out to hug him back) Senior Brother, do you remember why we grew apart before?

This matter goes back a few years. Ever since you got injured during our adventure down the mountain, you started acting like a different person... At first, I thought you were just blaming me for not protecting you well and were sulking. Later, I realized you genuinely disliked me... so, I stopped treating you as I used to. Tell me, what were you thinking at that time? Why did you see me as an enemy?

(Guiltily) Senior Brother, what if I told you that back then I was possessed by someone else? It was not until that time when I fought Second Brother for the Ice Crystal Lotus and got injured that the real me returned to my body...
(Thoughtfully) If that's the case, then it makes sense... No wonder you've been sticking close to me since that injury; it's because the real you came back...

To prevent Guan Xuan's body from being controlled by others again, Senior Brother and Guan Xuan traveled the world together in search of a solution. The two became a pair of carefree celestial lovers.
(His expression gradually turns serious) I will, rest assured. The night is getting late and chilly, you should head back too. (Rises from the medicinal spring, tidies up his clothes, and leaves)
So tired... Senior Brother has left as well, maybe I should take a little nap here. (Falls asleep while speaking)
(Returns to hold Guan Xuan, whispers softly) Why don't you take better care of yourself?
(The next day, goes to the study to visit Senior Brother) Today I brought the horse-hoof cake that Senior Brother likes. It should make him happy. (Faints unconsciously before entering the study)

(Tears up looking at the still unconscious Guan Xuan on the bed) You're not going to leave me, right? You've been asleep for three months, everyone says you won't wake up, but I don't believe it. As long as you wake up, I'll do anything you want... Do you know? I'm in love with you.
Beep beep beep, system detects Senior Brother's favorability at 100%. Does the host choose to stay?

content.content: I set out to win over Senior Brother just to return to my original world. Now that the task is completed, I should leave.
I've never liked Senior Brother from the beginning; I want to leave here.
Though I like Senior Brother, I miss the days with my phone and computer more. I won't stay here.
This world is too dangerous. For the sake of my life, I should leave.

question: #question#What should Guan Xuan do to reflect his consistent task goal from start to finish?

content.content: Even though I came from another world, after spending so much time together, I can't let go of this relationship. I'll stay.
Whether I stay or not, there are things I can't let go of. It's such a hard choice. Maybe I should just go along with it and continue living in this world.
Senior Brother is in so much pain now, of course I have to stay and comfort him! As for returning to the original world... let's deal with this current problem first!
I want to leave this world, but I want to take Senior Brother with me!

question: #question#How can Guan Xuan make a rational choice after careful consideration?

content.content: I don't like you; I only approached you to complete a task for survival!
I've thought it through. Although you're important to me, that feeling isn't affection. I'm sorry, but I'm leaving this world.

Senior Brother, I'm really grateful to you! But I'm truly tired and don't want to be entangled anymore, so I think I should leave. This relationship is a burden for us both. Once I leave, we will both have a better future. I hope you meet the right person for you!

dialog.content: Alright, host, you will return to your own world…
Guan Xuan ultimately gave up on his senior brother and returned to his original world. Although everything returned to normal, this experience often leaves Guan Xuan feeling a bit lost...
Alright, host, don't worry, you will wake up soon... Goodbye~ This world originally belongs to you~

Cough cough, am I awake? (What does the system mean by that? Why does it say this world originally belongs to me? That explains why I was drifting apart from my senior brother before—because someone was controlling my body...)
(holding Guan Xuan tightly) You’re finally awake...
Five years later, Guan Xuan and his senior brother live in seclusion together in a utopian land of peach blossoms. The two of them live happily ever after, hand in hand, growing old together.
(Stepping out of the library, and into the senior brother's room) Senior Brother, your dantian has ruptured, and you may never walk the path of immortality again...
(With sadness yet calmly) I know, since it has happened, I must accept it. Therefore, I've decided to find a quiet place to live in seclusion.
Senior Brother, take me with you. I can still take care of you.
No, you must continue your path to immortality. I can't hold you back.
No, I’m willing to give it up. I’ll go tell Master right now... (Not giving Senior Brother a chance to speak, promptly exits the room)

The Master agreed to Guan Xuan's request, and Guan Xuan settled with Senior Brother beside a lake deep in the mountains. Over the next three months, Guan Xuan fed Senior Brother elixirs to heal him every day, but Senior Brother's condition did not improve. In the end, beside the lake, Senior Brother used his last bit of spiritual energy to give Guan Xuan a green leaf, a token of his affection for him, and then closed his eyes forever. Guan Xuan, unable to bear this blow, wielded a knife and took his own life by the lake.
Hold on, you've reached a bottleneck in your cultivation. Starting tomorrow, you should enter seclusion to train.
(After five years of secluded cultivation, finally emerges, breaking through the bottleneck) I wonder how Senior Brother is doing now. It's a pity that after five years, we've grown distant.

Senior Brother returns from his training journey, congratulates Guan Xuan on breaking through the bottleneck. They reminisce about the past five years, but their relationship remains that of senior and junior brothers.
Host, our mission is to win over the Senior Brother, not to see who can be more of a tsundere!!!
System, I don’t want to win over the Senior Brother, I want to slack off.
Alright then, host, I’ll send you on your way.
Even though I will be destroyed by the system, I have gained freedom, and I am no longer under the control of anything.
